item.description:
3 Day Workshop:

Perfect Health, Perfect Weight, Perfect Life!
Supplement free living through diet and lifestyle changes.

August 26th- 27th- 28th Weekend Workshop
(all raw meals are included)

With Dr. Douglas Graham, Author of the book: The 80/10/10 Diet

Details here: http://www.rawfoodcentral.com/drdouggraham/

Come join us for and exciting and informative weekend workshop with international expert and author, Dr. Doug Graham. He will walk us through 80/10/10 diet himself and show us unique and practical ways how to make a simple raw food diet in combination with proper exercise a way of life. You and your family will gain the confidence you need to make diet and lifestyle choices conducive towards becoming and staying healthy. Losing cravings and food addictions while at the same time losing weight and gaining muscle are added benefits. Enjoying raw vegan food while creating healthy environments for your life are necessary for abundant healthy living.

Dr. Graham will be coming from the UK for this special event.
We feel deeply honored to have him here.

Catch this up close and personal event with Dr. Graham!

We will be serving ORGANIC, RIPE, DELICIOUS, COLORFUL meals that will be enjoyed during the workshop and all food is included.

Remember, if you ignore your health, it WILL go away!

This event is sponsored by: Raw Food Central
446 Broad Street, Windsor, CT 06095
________________________________________

To see the total program go to

http://www.rawfoodcentral.com/drdouggraham/

The 80/10/10 Diet

*Get $50 off with the code: "BRMG"

You can print a Name Tag here:
http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags/
item.name: Weekend Workshop with Dr. Doug Graham
